overview: “Férias Trocadas”, a new comedy produced by Paris Entertainment, starts filming this week in Cartagena, Colombia, and features Edmilson Filho in a double dose! He plays Zé and Edu or José Eduardo Santos, two homonymous men who, by coincidence, travel to Cartagena on the same day and when they arrive at the place, a great confusion changes the destiny of their families!  Directed by Bruno Barreto, the film also features Carol Castro, Aline Campos, Klara Castanho, Matheus Costa and Gustavo Mendes. With distribution by Paris Filmes, the release date is December 29, 2022.
title: Férias Trocadas
